name: 【SPAP #38】根｜Root
description:
※ 標記AP之作品為畫師校樣版，請勿購買，如要購買請至 [SoulPaint NFT](https://opensea.io/collection/soul-paint-nft)。

－

【夢境故事】

我抱著困難與疑惑，來到這個村落，其中一棵崇高的神木矗立著。傳聞神木啟迪智慧與靈魂，引領著人們，為此我遠道而來，追尋答案的真蹟。村落裡，我終於找到了神秘的解悟。據說神木樹幹內藏著特殊的故事，彷彿能量在其中躍動，神奇的魅力散發著。

－

【Dream Story】

With difficulty and doubt in my heart, I arrived at this village, where a majestic sacred tree stood tall. Rumor had it that this divine tree held the key to wisdom and enlightenment, guiding people on their path. Intrigued by this legend, I embarked on a long journey in search of the miraculous truth. Within the village, I finally discovered the enigmatic revelation. It was said that the trunk of the sacred tree harbored a tapestry of extraordinary tales, as if pulsating with vibrant energy, exuding an enchantment of its own.
